message: I like desktop applications. Public API Web Services helps to make the perfect desktop application. When will made the application Convore for Mac OS X? :)
Hard to tell.. the desktop apps are still quicker in response imho. But using Convore as a Fluid app is working alright.

nowadays are coming more and more apps built as a mix of the two. AppStore for example is a desktop applicaction, where all the "inside" is web. So, I guess web will win. BUT we'll always need desktop apps at least to run the webapp :P
iTunes was the first desktop based web app I remember.
